commit.message:
Prefer cstddef over string.h for size_t definition

Fewest overall definitions of the headers which provide it.

commit.message: Include cstring where used, and note which definitions are used

verification.payload:
tree 909b791eaa268cf4814b70a56b96ade400f5e93b
parent 4f986e69440daa27a8461c1c9debd2edcc0945ee
author Ben Woosley <ben.woosley@gmail.com> 1530483521 -0400
committer Ben Woosley <ben.woosley@gmail.com> 1530485421 -0400

Include cstring where used, and note which definitions are used

files.patch:
@@ -6,7 +6,7 @@
 #include <config/bitcoin-config.h>
 #endif
 
-#include <cstring>
+#include <cstring> // memchr
 
 #if HAVE_DECL_STRNLEN == 0
 size_t strnlen( const char *start, size_t max_len)

@@ -12,6 +12,8 @@
 # include <arpa/inet.h>
 #endif
 
+#include <cstring> // memcpy, memset, strncmp, memcmp
+
 static std::atomic<bool> g_initial_block_download_completed(false);
 
 namespace NetMsgType {
